<gco:CharacterString xmlns:gco="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco">           54JR         </gco:CharacterString>       </gmd:code>     </gmd:MD_Identifier>   </gmi:identifier>   <gmi:description>     <gco:CharacterString xmlns:gco="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco">       The JOIDES Resolution is a riserless drilling vessel operated for worldwide scientific drilling during the Ocean Drilling Program (ODP), the Integrated Ocean Drilling Program (IODP), and the International Ocean Discovery Program (IODP).  The Science Operator for the JR under the U.S. Science Support Program, funded by the National Science Foundation, is Texas A and M University.     </gco:CharacterString>   </gmi:description>   <gmi:sponsor>     <gmd:CI_ResponsibleParty xmlns:gmd="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd">       <gmd:organisationName>         <gco:CharacterString xmlns:gco="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco">           U.S. Science Support Program/National Science Foundation (NSF)         </gco:CharacterString>       </gmd:organisationName>       <gmd:role>         <gmd:CI_RoleCode codeList="sponsor" codeListValue="">           sponsor         </gmd:CI_RoleCode>       </gmd:role>     </gmd:CI_ResponsibleParty>   </gmi:sponsor>   <gmi:instrument>     <gmi:MI_Instrument>       <gmi:identifier>         <gmd:MD_Identifier xmlns:gmd="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd">           <gmd:code>             <gco:CharacterString xmlns:gco="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco">               APC             </gco:CharacterString>           </gmd:code>         </gmd:MD_Identifier>       </gmi:identifier>       <gmi:type>         <gco:CharacterString xmlns:gco="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco">           Advanced Piston Corer         </gco:CharacterString>       </gmi:type>       <gmi:description>         <gco:CharacterString xmlns:gco="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco">           The Advanced Piston Corer is used in soft ooze and sediments.         </gco:CharacterString>       </gmi:description>     </gmi:MI_Instrument>   </gmi:instrument>   <gmi:instrument>     <gmi:MI_Instrument>       <gmi:identifier>         <gmd:MD_Identifier xmlns:gmd="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd">           <gmd:code>             <gco:CharacterString xmlns:gco="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco">               Half APC             </gco:CharacterString>           </gmd:code>         </gmd:MD_Identifier>       </gmi:identifier>       <gmi:type>         <gco:CharacterString xmlns:gco="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco">           Half Advanced Piston Corer         </gco:CharacterString>       </gmi:type>       <gmi:description>         <gco:CharacterString xmlns:gco="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco">           The Half Advanced Piston Corer is used to recover high-quality cores from short intervals of soft sediment between hard layers (e.g., ooze/chalk between chert layers) and to extend the depth of a piston core hole.         </gco:CharacterString>       </gmi:description>     </gmi:MI_Instrument>   </gmi:instrument>   <gmi:instrument>     <gmi:MI_Instrument>       <gmi:identifier>         <gmd:MD_Identifier xmlns:gmd="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd">           <gmd:code>             <gco:CharacterString xmlns:gco="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco">               RCB             </gco:CharacterString>           </gmd:code>         </gmd:MD_Identifier>       </gmi:identifier>       <gmi:type>         <gco:CharacterString xmlns:gco="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco">           Rotary Core Barrel         </gco:CharacterString>       </gmi:type>       <gmi:description>         <gco:CharacterString xmlns:gco="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco">           The Rotary Core Barrel is used in medium to hard crystalline sediments.         </gco:CharacterString>       </gmi:description>     </gmi:MI_Instrument>   </gmi:instrument>   <gmi:instrument>     <gmi:MI_Instrument>       <gmi:identifier>         <gmd:MD_Identifier xmlns:gmd="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd">           <gmd:code>             <gco:CharacterString xmlns:gco="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco">               XCB             </gco:CharacterString>           </gmd:code>         </gmd:MD_Identifier>       </gmi:identifier>       <gmi:type>         <gco:CharacterString xmlns:gco="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco">           Extended Core Barrel         </gco:CharacterString>       </gmi:type>       <gmi:description>         <gco:CharacterString xmlns:gco="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco">           The Extended Core Barrel is used in firm sediments.         </gco:CharacterString>       </gmi:description>     </gmi:MI_Instrument>   </gmi:instrument>   <gmi:instrument>     <gmi:MI_Instrument>       <gmi:identifier>         <gmd:MD_Identifier xmlns:gmd="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd">           <gmd:code>             <gco:CharacterString xmlns:gco="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco">               MDCB             </gco:CharacterString>           </gmd:code>         </gmd:MD_Identifier>       </gmi:identifier>       <gmi:type>         <gco:CharacterString xmlns:gco="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco">           Motor Driven Core Barrel         </gco:CharacterString>       </gmi:type>       <gmi:description>         <gco:CharacterString xmlns:gco="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco">           The Motor Driven Core Barrel is used in interbedded materials and hard fractured rock .         </gco:CharacterString>       </gmi:description>     </gmi:MI_Instrument>   </gmi:instrument>   <gmi:instrument>     <gmi:MI_Instrument>       <gmi:identifier>         <gmd:MD_Identifier xmlns:gmd="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd">           <gmd:code>             <gco:CharacterString xmlns:gco="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco">               PCS             </gco:CharacterString>           </gmd:code>         </gmd:MD_Identifier>       </gmi:identifier>       <gmi:type>         <gco:CharacterString xmlns:gco="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco">           Pressure Core Sampler         </gco:CharacterString>       </gmi:type>       <gmi:description>         <gco:CharacterString xmlns:gco="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco">           The Pressure Core Sampler is used in sediments while maintaining in situ pressure .         </gco:CharacterString>       </gmi:description>     </gmi:MI_Instrument>   </gmi:instrument> </gmi:MI_Platform>
